olark.away_message: Our live support feature is currently offline, Please try again later.
olark.chat_input_text: Type here and hit enter to chat
olark.welcome_message: Welcome to FanTeam chat.  You can use this chat window to chat with our support.
olark.offline_note_message: We are offline, send us a message
olark.introduction_messages: Welcome, just fill out some brief information and click Start Chat to talk to us
olark.introduction_error_text: Please leave a name and email address so we can contact you in case we get disconnected
olark.offline_note_error_text: You must complete all fields and specify a valid email address
olark.offline_note_thankyou_text: Thank you for your message.  We will get back to you as soon as we can.
olark.disabled_input_text_when_convo_has_ended: chat ended, refresh for new chat
olark.disabled_panel_text_when_convo_has_ended: This conversation has ended, but all you need to do is refresh the page to start a new one!
